meta.name: description
meta.content: With an enrollment of 2,734 students, Greensburg Salem is located 35 miles southeast of Pittsburgh, PA in the center of Westmoreland County. The District covers an area of 51 square miles that include urban, suburban and rural populations. Students live in the City of Greensburg, Salem Township and the boroughs of South Greensburg and Southwest Greensburg for a total population of 26,744 residents (based on PA County Data Book of 2011)

li.a: Central Westmoreland Career andÂ Technology Center

img.alt: Dr. Peiffer, Mrs. Vottero, and Don Dai in the Library

div.div: Students please complete the Daily Check In form by clicking the GREEN "Read full story" button.
Per Gov. Wolf: anyone entering a GSSD school must wear a face mask. Visitors without masks must wait outside. Click link for "how to make a mask."
Please read this detailed letter from Dr. Peiffer concerning the District's approach to graduation this year.
Your participation in this survey is extremely important, as it will help support grant applications that can fund improved broadband.
Our dedicated nurses want to make sure that we are staying healthy during the closure. They have shared some tips with us. Click the link for information.
Please see the attached letter regarding where to submit help tickets to address technology issues with the laptops or accessing online lessons
If you have NOT registered for a Parent Portal account, please click the link to set up your NEW account. Access student grades and progress using the portal.

h3.a: Students with District Issued Device Problems

div.div: HAVING HARDWARE PROBLEMS? Please email StudentHelpdesk@gslions.net to report camera, display or "device not found" message issues. Include the studentâs name, device number, and the problem.
